description: A start flow created along with the agent

text: Welcome to BankBuddy, your trusted companion for all your banking needs! How can I assist you today?
Hi! I’m BankBuddy, your personal banking assistant. I’m here to simplify banking for you. Let’s dive into the world of easy banking
Greetings! I'm BankBuddy, designed to simplify your banking journey. Let's get started - how can I support you today?
Welcome! I’m BankBuddy, committed to making your banking experience as easy as possible. Let’s get started on your financial journey!
